vp.description: Pharmaceutical want to use animal testing for their new drugs, and want government approval.
PETA is looking to ban commercial farms.
There has been high rates of crime in the south and the victims seek compensation from the state
We've found a new oil feild. Can we start fracking?

doctor.description: Our hospitals are underfunded. Our equipment is outdated and we are constantly short on staff. We want the government to invest $100 000 into better healthcare.
We want to build a new hospital. There's not enough and people have to drive long distances for the nearest hospital.

scientist.description: We want permission to use nuclear power for our projects, but the head scientist won't let us.
We've developed a potientially life-saving drug, but we need to test it on animals first for safety.

citizen.description: Can we get rid of the homeless people? All they do is take up space, litter, and defacate on the streets!
The factories are making us sick! Take them down!

CIA.description: We are concerned about certain extremist groups within the country. To maintain safety of the nation, we need to comprimise certain civil libreties of the citizens.
CIA wants to get rid of the protesters outside. They've been a pain to deal with.

foreign.description: We need to sanction Russia before they get out of hand
Can we search for survivors outside of our borders?

military.description: We need to increase our defense budget and spend more on the military. Foreign powers are becoming stronger and will soon be a real threat towards us. We need to be able to defend outselves.
We want more fighter jets. The ones we have are worn out and outdated

economy.description: We need to raise taxes to fund the government or we're going to run into a lot of debt
Lets cut social programs before we go bankrupt!
